Albany.Crossgates Mall: Crossgates Mall is a shopping mall located in the Albany suburb of Guilderland, New York. The center opened on March 4, 1984, and in October 1994 underwent a large expansion that nearly doubled its size. Crossgates has a gross leasable area of 1,700,000 sq ft (160,000 m2) and features over 250 stores and restaurants as well as an 18-screen IMAX Regal Cinema theater.
